app_descript:
Claude by Anthropic: Your AI Companion for Every Task

Whether you're drafting a business proposal, translating menus while traveling, brainstorming gift ideas, or composing speeches, Claude is your reliable AI assistant, ready to help at any moment. With Claude, harness the power of AI to enhance productivity and creativity effortlessly.
